note.p: Death: His home Friars Carse, near Dumfries, Scotland (21 April 1794)
Career: Captain, 32nd (Cornwall) Regiment of Foot, Ireland (1780); joined 12th (Prince of Wales's) regiment of light dragoons (1792); friend of Robert Burns
Proposed as candidate (13 March 1794), but died before ballot was held
Sonnet by Robert Burns on Riddell's death in GM (1794) part i, p.461
